title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: West Barnstable Conservation Area – Cape Cod, Massachusetts
content:
Support us! BikeRumor may earn a small commission from affiliate links in this article. Learn more.

Photo submitted by Jeff Wdow, “The single track in the West Barnstable Conservation Area on Cape Cod, Massachusetts, apparently was named Trail of Tears by the very first mountain bikers to ride it. But the 21 miles of single track inspire mostly smiles these days. I’ve had my Scott Spark RC 900 Pro for almost two years, riding mostly rocky, technical terrain. Storming through the twisty, flowy and flat sections of ToT single track at a near-road-bike pace was the first time I got to truly experience the speed this bike is capable of.”

We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here.
author: Kristi Benedict
